verse.name: v1
verse.lines: "Trust in the Lord with all thine heart," This is God's gracious command; "In all thy ways acknowledge Him, So shalt thou dwell in the land."

verse.name: c
v2
verse.lines: "Trust in the Lord" who ruleth all, Seeth all things as they are, Be it a birdling in its nest, Or yonder uttermost star.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: "Trust in the Lord" and peaceful be, Fret not thy spirit in vain, What tho' the answer tarries long, Still shalt hou praise Him again.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: "Trust in the Lord"--His eye will guide All thro' your pathway ahead, He hath redeemed and He will keep, Trust Him and be not afraid.
